Teaching

2017 - 2018

I taught Telematics arquitectures and services, an undergraduate course in the degree on Engineering and Telecommunication Technologies (BSc), Universidade de Vigo. This course is aimed at the study of different solutions for service-oriented architectures and their deployment using Web Services technologies.
I also supervised 1 student internship in a company.
